title: 325btc
author: 325btc
content: Borish johnson uk priminester and off course second one donald trump they dont let world go in mess but other leaders will drive world into mess.If uk boris and usa trump will create ally will join then all the mess can be fixed Also boris was and still is best for uk and uk people know this Same goes for trumpWhat about other countries?Well they are creating a mess but trump and jonshon are quite good

comments.author: coolcoinz
comments.body: Trump, the guy who couldn't take an election loss and told people to take matters in their own hands? One thing I have to give him is that Putin was waiting with the attack on Ukraine for the results of the US election. Joe must've seemed weak to him because the "special operation" begun soon after a meeting between these two. Johnson was blindsided. I feel like what he did should not end with him forced out of the minister's chair. Many politicians ignored covid restrictions like the prime minister of Finland and she kept her position.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: You must be joking if you mean that the most racist person in the world is capable of managing even his own crises, let alone global crises.Donald Trump built the apartheid wall between America and Mexico and separated children from their mothers when he suddenly decided to expel immigrants. This person could not bear to lose the elections and asked the masses to storm the White House in a historical precedent that distorted the history of the greatest country in the world. You are definitely joking.

During their rule we have a lot of mess in the world. What will change the world can only be love! If we can change our mindset and stop hate no matter what has happened to us then will the world has peace, progress, prosperity and most importantly Good leaders.

comments.author: paxmao
comments.body: Would the OP care to give some non brain-dead arguments instead of just click baiting arguments? It may actually become a decent discussion instead of a few disconnected "views" about a couple of populists that ended up their careers as the moral-less clowns they are.

comments.author: 325btc
comments.body: Quote from: paxmao on July 25, 2022, 08:28:21 AMWould the OP care to give some non brain-dead arguments instead of just click baiting arguments? It may actually become a decent discussion instead of a few disconnected "views" about a couple of populists that ended up their careers as the moral-less clowns they are.They are good ones trump is also smart builder and real estate developer

comments.author: GloryBeryle
comments.body: As an adult, our statements must be reasonable and responsible.Â  Where is that logic from that the world is a mess because two people are out ? I am not here to discuss who these two are and what they have or have not done. Just this statement alone is super dangerous. The world is as it is and how it is going to be, regardless of some people's influence. A great leader may make some big decisions or policies but that only happens in a limited span of time and areas. It might be an influential factor to the world but can never determine where the world goes. Being reasonable is the first thing we should learn as we grow up.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.created_time: November 12, 2022, 01:42:04 PMLast edit: November 12, 2022, 01:53:00 PM by Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 24, 2022, 11:43:09 AMBorish johnson uk priminester and off course second one donald trump they dont let world go in mess but other leaders will drive world into mess.If uk boris and usa trump will create ally will join then all the mess can be fixed Also boris was and still is best for uk and uk people know this Same goes for trumpWhat about other countries?Well they are creating a mess but trump and jonshon are quite goodEveryone is free to make comments and suggestions about his views or beliefs. But such comments should be backed with facts and verifiable evidence. You didn't include any document or argument to prove that it was the absence of Johnson and Trump in the political space that caused the problems the world is facing currently. During the Covid-19, what was Trumps response and what was Johnson's action? The Russia-Ukraine conflict have destabilize the world's economy, do you think both leaders would have averted or stopped this war?These two leaders had their strength and weaknesses. Trump really strengthened the economy of the US but he cared less about the world because of his policy of America, First. He made America to relinquish its title of the police of the world.Trump even canceled so many treaties signed by the past government to promote world peace and green energy. His last days in office showed Trump as an autocrat that possessed the African mentality of holding firm to power. Johnson was a very good actor that ended up deceiving his people. He did not do what he preached and this led to his undoing.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 24, 2022, 11:43:09 AMBorish johnson uk priminester and off course second one donald trump they dont let world go in mess but other leaders will drive world into mess.If uk boris and usa trump will create ally will join then all the mess can be fixed Also boris was and still is best for uk and uk people know this Same goes for trumpWhat about other countries?Well they are creating a mess but trump and jonshon are quite goodYou must be kidding. Being so vague makes me think that you don't know what's been done under their leadership versus leadership of others. But that doesn't surprise me at all as truth or knowledge doesn't matter to this kind of Qanon-like attitude. Problem is that people who fell for Trump don't trust any media or scientist consensus, but they blindly trust other people that don't trust media or scientists either. This creates an opportunity for some people to lead these people and earn money feeding misinformation and use them.And ironically they call people who criticize them "sheep".

This creates an opportunity for some people to lead these people and earn money feeding misinformation and use them.And ironically they call people who criticize them "sheep".It's obviously a troll. Donald Trump was one of the worst things that come to USA and the World. Usually USA presidents have second term but luckily we get rid of him in four years. Those who think he can be a candidate again is in a big delusion. Even republicans don't want him anymore. Biden is not a saint or a savior either. Boris Johnson was incapable. UK couldn't find a good president yet. At least they still have democracy. If world is in a mess, the reason is not USA and UK leaders, it's more complex situation.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: These two nations have taken a pretty strong stand in the world, stating that whatever they do or say will undoubtedly have an impact on the world in some way. But you can't draw the conclusion that if those two are out, the world will be a shambles; that just isn't the case. There are many wonderful people in the world whose actions have a global impact, but they are all secluded in their own areas and only concern about the things they can influence that the rest of the world needs to survive. If a leader does or says something that will have an impact on other regions of the world, a quicker remedy will be offered to address it.

comments.author: worldofcoins
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 24, 2022, 11:43:09 AMBorish johnson uk priminester and off course second one donald trump they dont let world go in mess but other leaders will drive world into mess.If uk boris and usa trump will create ally will join then all the mess can be fixed Also boris was and still is best for uk and uk people know this Same goes for trumpWhat about other countries?Well they are creating a mess but trump and jonshon are quite goodRemember, there is a term called, 'One's honey, other's poison' If one is good for us, it doesn't mean the others are thinking the same way we are. In my opinion, a good person is a person who is good toward others. Here other means the other nations, not their states.

comments.author: Lordhermes
comments.body: Quote from: worldofcoins on November 16, 2022, 10:04:58 AMQuote from: 325btc on July 24, 2022, 11:43:09 AMBorish johnson uk priminester and off course second one donald trump they dont let world go in mess but other leaders will drive world into mess.If uk boris and usa trump will create ally will join then all the mess can be fixed Also boris was and still is best for uk and uk people know this Same goes for trumpWhat about other countries?Well they are creating a mess but trump and jonshon are quite goodRemember, there is a term called, 'One's honey, other's poison' If one is good for us, it doesn't mean the others are thinking the same way we are. In my opinion, a good person is a person who is good toward others. Here other means the other nations, not their states. I am aware that wonderful individuals fade away, yet the world is not in chaos as a result of their absence. People who are aware of what is good and proper but choose not to act upon it are the only thing keeping the world in a mess. The world will continue to be in disarray if we are unable to acknowledge our mistakes and repent of wrongdoing that is detrimental to the expansion and growth of the community.But in order for us to change the world, we must show kindness to both our neighbors and strangers.
